attributes.additional_details:
Company's are putting cancer causing agents in their products to replace sugar 

There is no sugar alternative I can't choose any sugary drinks I'm willing to pay more but company's are not putting sugar in at all due to sugar tax

Sugar is much better than aspartame and acesulfame!

It's against democracy to dictate we must not have sugar at all reduce sugar but do not allow sweeteners to take it's place 

Science has indicated sweeteners are not good and should be banned
attributes.background: Since the sugar tax and even before the sugar tax many company's have been changing their sugar usage to put artificial sweeteners In their drinks and sweets now when I look In all places all drinks contain sweeteners, there is no longer a choice anymore!
